import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import Breadcrumb from '../../../../../layout/breadcrumb'; import Dropzone from 'react-dropzone-uploader'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { withRouter, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ProjectTitle, ClientName, ProjectRate, ProjectStatus, ProgressLevel, ProjectSize, Small, Medium, Big, StartingDate, EndingDate, EnterSomeDetails, UploadProjectFile, Add, Cancel, Done, Doing } from '../../../../../constant'; const EducationalCoursesCreationHelper = ({ }) => { return (
{errors.title && 'Title is required'} {errors.client_name && 'Client Name is required'} {errors.description && 'Some Details is required'}
); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userData: state.auth.data } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { })(EducationalCoursesCreationHelper);
